sections.heading: (a) A copy of an environmental covenant shall be provided by the persons and in the manner required by the agency to:(1) Each person that signed the covenant;(2) Each person holding a recorded interest in the real property subject to the covenant;(3) Each person in possession of the real property su
sections.text: (a) A copy of an environmental covenant shall be provided by the persons and in the manner required by the agency to:(1) Each person that signed the covenant;(2) Each person holding a recorded interest in the real property subject to the covenant;(3) Each person in possession of the real property subject to the covenant;(4) Each municipality or other unit of local government in which real property subject to the covenant is located; and(5) Any other person the agency requires.(b) The validity of a covenant is not affected by failure to provide a copy of the covenant as required under this section.SourceLaws 2005, LB 298, ยง 8.
